content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a newly built, unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed on was 900 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As a landlord, I am satisfied with the outcome, given that it meets my financial goals and provides a fair deal for the tenant. I would rate my satisfaction at an 8 out of 10.
name: Peter Schmidt
